name: My Casual Adventure
description:
The game is set in Britain around 1340, right after the black plague.

Story

Your father has left home and appears to be missing, You decide to try and find him, when you discover its your birthday, and he has left you a gift.

The game has some religious and ethical quests and conversations.

Features

  • Open World
  • Real time close combat
  • Grow Food
  • Fish
  • Stock market
  • Dice games
  • Talk to many interesting characters
  • Discover secret treasure chests and items
  • Explore dungeons
  • Do work for villagers
  • Play as a boy or a girl
  • Works on Android and IOS devices

Credit
